com.netflix.governator.commons_cli.modules

Class OptionsModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractModule
      • com.netflix.governator.commons_cli.modules.OptionsModule

  • public abstract class OptionsModule
extends AbstractModule
    Guicify Apache Commons CLI. Usages 
     {code
 
 // When creating Guice
 
 install(new OptionsModule() {
    protected void configure() {
       option("f")
          .hasArg()
          .withLongOpt("filename")
          .annotatedWith(Filename.class);  // no need to call create()
          
    }
 })
 
 // Inject into any class
    Author:
    elandau

        protected <any> bindParser()
